snippet: Republican senators who are thought most susceptible to a political backlash for blocking any new Supreme Court nominee appear to be shaking off concern and joining the call to wait for the next president to fill the vacancy caused by Antonin Scalia’s death. And that is just fine with some Democrats.
abstract: Republican senators who are thought most susceptible to a political backlash for blocking any new Supreme Court nominee appear to be shaking off concern and joining the call to wait for the next president to fill the vacancy caused by Antonin Scalia’s death. And that is just fine with some Democrats.

headline.main: Democrats See Chance to Bolster Enthusiasm in G.O.P. Pledge to Block Scalia Replacement
